#### 2.0.2
##### Added
- Couch
    + getAdapter()
    + setAdapter(CouchHttpAdapterInterface $adapter)
    + initAdapter($opts)
- Adapters
    + CouchHttpAdaterCurl
    + CouchHttpAdapterSocket
- doc/couch.md
- changelist.md

##### Fixed
- Removed echoes that were causing unexpected output
- Fixed some classes import
- Fixed Cookie parsing
